items.question: Will there be a fourth season?
items.answer: The fourth and final season has been released in 2018.

items.question: Will there be a Third Season?
items.answer: Apparently, yes. Writing started in Jan 2014, Filming was due to start Sep 2014. Episode 1 of season 3 aired 9-28-2015 in Denmark and Sweden, and season 4 has also been planned.
